content:
Q: How do I enquire about changing my course?
A: Please note a change of course mid stage through an academic year or 2 weeks after the start date of a programme cannot be accommodated. If you wish to request a change of programme in the first two weeks of your course or before classes start, please contact admissions@dbs.ie

metadata.source_file: FAQs from Students at Dublin Business School.pdf
metadata.question: How do I enquire about changing my course?
